entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve code readability by using extention methods #63485
  • Document the memory model guaranteed by dotnet/runtime runtimes #63474
  • OOB Library's AssemblyVersion is inconsistent between ref and src assemblies in servicing #63467
  • [wasm][debugger] Show a better stack trace for final user #63466
  • [wasm] Make WasmMainJSPath optional #63465
    7.0.0
  • Json SourceGen tests are not running on .NET Framework #63463
  • 6.0 source-build servicing builds are not producing all runtime libs/packages #63451
  • JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverter Returns ObjectDefaultConverter, Insted of Expected Null #63444
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails for covariant properties when [JsonIgnore] is specified #63443
  • [macos][arm64][CoreCLR] DllImportGenerator.Unit.Tests failed: Segmentation fault #63439
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.21568.2]Etymology App failed to launch with error that Header's referrer is missing #63479
    7.0.0
  • Add json deserialize interface attribute to specific class #63436
  • [Perf] Changes at 12/28/2021 6:18:01 PM #63453
  • Poor codegen for Vector128.Create() with constants sharing the same value #63432
    7.0.0
  • Apply ConstantExpected attribute in runtime repo APIs as needed #63426
    7.0.0
  • PhysicalFileInfo should report the right Length and LastModifiedTime for symbolic links #63424

Closed

  • System.Text.Json generator does not generate valid code for empty string default parameter constructors #62766
    6.0.x
  • Cant start generated program on linux (Ubuntu) #63267
  • .NET Version: 6.0.1 Fatal Error Runtime at IP 00007FF696C3917B with exit code 80131506 (ExecutionEngineException?) #63127
  • .Net6: When i enable server gc mode my application start crashing frequently. #63070
  • Enable using live ref pack in source generator unit tests #60605
    7.0.0
  • [quesion] mono touch hold monoobject* in internal call behavior? #63440
  • Expose a property in System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage which will give the remote ip it connects to #38407
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add Source-Process Property to TcpConnectionInformation #63099
  • Delegates are poorly inlined and optimized #63425
  • Convert remaining SAL v1 annotations to SAL v2 annotations #63307
  • Socket ReceiveAsync method has bug when receiving multicast packets #63327
  • The Microsoft.NETCore.App runtime for .NET preview7 is missing when install .NET6 preview7 and 6.0.100 GA at the same time. #63096

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix exception propagation over HW exception frame on macOS arm64 #63482
    arch-arm64, os-mac-os-x, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Make it easier to enable FEATURE_AUTO_TRACE #63478
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add Regex FindFirstChar optimization for a literal after an atomic loop #63477
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix Fiji time zone time conversion #63476
    area-System.Runtime, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] Fix gc_heap::remove_ro_segment #63473
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix NETStandard library using JSON source gen #63472
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Clarify P/Invoke shims guidance for OOB assemblies #63470
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Do not set `GTF_NO_CSE` for sources of block copies #63462
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Reduce buffer size used in XmlReader when using Async mode #63459
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Include properties on records for (de)serialization in source-gen #63454
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Bump SdkVersionForWorkloadTesting to use a 200 band SDK #63450
    area-Infrastructure
  • Handle embedded assignments in copy propagation #63447
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Mark constant arguments of HWINTRINSIC nodes as DONT_CSE #63442
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WebSocket tests on NodeJS #63441
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • Disable MemoryMappedFileTests failing on macOS/arm64 + coreclr due to too long path #63438
    area-System.IO
  • Move init-vs-env in test build script down #63433
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Align rva fields in reflection emit #63430
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [wasm][tests] Fix, and simplify sample building on CI #63429
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Improve use of {Last}IndexOf{Any} in Regex loops #63428
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix Regex if-then-else code generation #63427
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Ensure UserSecretsIdAttribute is added to assembly #63423
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Hosting, 6.0.2
  • [Arm64] Keep unrolling InitBlock and CopyBlock up to 128 bytes #63422
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make DllImportGenerator unit tests' compilations use live refs #63410
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Fix bugs with generation for ctor param default values #62798
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Making user secrets optional by default #62917
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 6.0.2
  • JIT: save generics context for late devirtualization #63420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure UserSecretsIdAttribute is added to assembly #63415
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [DRAFT][Perf][Mono] Enable llvm for arm perf runs #63311
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Make some icalls pass/return object references using ObjectHandleOnStack/QCallTypeHandle #62141
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [DllImportGenerator] Remove DLLIMPORTGENERATOR_ENABLED define option #63464
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix stack overflow with X509Certificate FriendlyName #63179
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono] Reorganize zlib dependency logic #63365
    area-Build-mono
  • Refactor DllImports in Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd #63421
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix bug where we reference the entry #0 in the pinned plug queue #63351
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • Fix time reporting for the merged tests #63452
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix XXHash for stripe size #61923
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 6.0.2
  • [6.0] Fix named mutexes on OSX to work between arm64 and emulated x64 processes #62765
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Change macOS activatin injection failure handling #63393
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Unify the FlushProcessWriteBuffers mechanism for macOS arm64 / x64 #63301
    Servicing-approved, area-PAL-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • Convert SAL1 to SAL2 #63333
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix test filtering for debugger tests on windows #63380
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Include properties on records for (de)serialization in source-gen #62668
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] GetProperties broken on chrome #63403
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • 'cmeq' Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #63112
    area-codeflow
  • Reduce the memory footprint of HttpHeaders #62981
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix TimeSpan support in sourcegen #62191
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix System.Object serialization with custom number handling #62193
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix custom JsonConverterFactories not working with nested type/property declarations. #62643
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1541200 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Draft][Perf] Enable LLVM on perf runs #63504
  • Update runtime.json with manjaro information #63338
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Initial changes for emscripten 2.0.34 #62499
    area-Build-mono
  • Faster IndexOf for substrings #63285
    area-System.Memory
  • Update coverlet and reportgenerator versions #63491
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [debugger] Fix reading a byte without checking the version of the Protocol #63503
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Suppress warnings about [Obsolete] member usage in JSON src-gen'd code #63501
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Make delegates unsupported by JsonSerializer #63495
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Enable IDE0059 analyzer: Unnecessary assignment of a value #63340
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Webpack & NextJS & TypeScript samples #63335
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add more automated test coverage for the wasm bindings as prep for custom marshalers #63498
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [release/6.0] Add explicit null-check for tailcalls to VSD #62769
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement System.Runtime.CompilerServices.DisabledRuntimeMarshallingAttribute on CoreCLR-family of runtimes/type systems #63320
    area-Interop-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: Support for Intel SHA extensions #62999
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Ensure the JIT view of InstructionSets is correct in the face of JitConfig switches #62420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating the x64 casting behavior to be IEEE 754 compliant and to use saturation for overflow #61761
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/6.0] Fix bugs with generation for ctor param default values (#62798) #63493
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.x
  • Enable regions by default #59283
    * NO MERGE *, area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix non-portable distroRID generation on Alpine Linux #62942
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Split `sendtohelixhelp.proj` to extract wasm, and mobile bits to separate files. #63373
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Support Single-file executable in Windows 7 #63196
    area-Single-File, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add the `coreclr/unwinder/loongarch64` from the #62979. #63489
    community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr/debug and part of inc directory. #62886
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [API Implementation]: System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.StringLanguageAttribute #62995
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RateLimiting] Dequeue items when queuing with NewestFirst #63377
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix the MacOS remote unwinder for VS4Mac #63405
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.2
  • Port MD4 managed implementation from mono/mono #62074
    area-System.Security
  • [metadata] Borrow bits from MonoClassField:parent for flags #63302
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/6.0-maui] Add back HAVE_SYS_ZLIB support #63359
    area-Build-mono
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Host
  • improve TLS resume on server #63030
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, 7.0.0
  • Allow StoreLclVar src to be IND/FLD. #59315
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor optimizing morph for commutative operations #63251
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • fix LocalCertificateSelectionCallback on unix #63200
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux, os-mac-os-x
  • add instructions for running on FreeBSD #63417
    community-contribution
  • First try at implementing newly suggested ctor for providing tighter control over charset #63231
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Allow CreateScalarUnsafe to be directly contained by hwintrinsics that support scalar loads #62407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ABI stress test coverage #63409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `System.Drawing.Graphics.NativeGraphics`. #63058
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix translation of Ping error codes #63237
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Sort properties by protection level in structures. #63339
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.0
  • 62606 Return fully qualified path from FileSystemEventArgs #63051
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono
  • Implement the last of the approved cross platform hardware intrinsics, except shuffle #63414
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
    area-System.Diagnostics, os-android

entry.content:

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NETSDK1100 when building projects with multiple TargetFrameworks #23306
  • Windows Update error 0x80070643 trying to install "2021-11 .NET 5.0.12 Update for x64 Client (KB5007884)" #23307
  • `dotnet` command has been removed from openSuse Leap 15.3 `dotnet-host` package #23304
  • Address obsolete ContentItemGroup.FindItems in PackageValidation #23301
  • `--no-restore false` isn't honored in the `dotnet build` and other commands #23297
    6.0.3xx
  • Provide better experience when the dotnet version installed with VS and the available .NET MAUI version don't match #23295
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.21568.2] GlobalTool trx2junit install failed #23289
  • `dotnet watch` WebSockets port configuration for HotReload #23283

Closed

  • Provide a way to end a hot reload session when using Visual Studio but not using the debugger #23143
  • Is Blazor Hot Report Supported for Visual Studio for Mac ? #22884
  • dotnet publish hangs in Windows for ~10min after completion #22948
    Discussion
  • dotnet-install.sh fails because the download URL returns . #23296

PullRequests

Created

  • Add the same condition we have for net 6 to net 7 #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23286
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update runHelixAndNonHelixInParallel.ps1 #23284
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update Version.Details.xml to account for package renames #23285
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add missing space to dotnet-watch restart always rude edit message #23281
  • Add missing space to dotnet-watch restart always rude edit message (#23281) #23282
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23232
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add an option to run dotnet-watch in non-interactive mode #23309
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Catch dotnet watch task cancellation after `CTRL+C` #23316
    Area-AspNetCore
  • userlocal detection: also force last digits to zero for non-preview versions. #23080
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/6.0.1xx] bump the error number for CompressionInSingleFileRequiresSelfContained #22676
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.1xx
  • Update System.CommandLine #23085
    Area-CLI
  • Patch 1 #21709
    Area-Compatibility

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Discussion: C# Break nested loop #869
  • Champion: "Partial Type Inference" #1349
    Any Time
  • Consider relaxing restrictions of async methods in blocks that do not contain `await`. #1331

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • navigation drop-downs in C # #58691
  • region should have different background color #58689
  • Quick Actions and Refactorings should allow user to add a new extension method #58688
  • Visual Studio should suggest private extension methods to be made public #58686
  • If a method is inaccessible due to its protection level, then Ctrl + . should make it public #58684
  • [UI] Indent incompatible types in CS0029 error popup in a way they can differ easier #58682
  • Text editor option for predecessor directives missing #58681
  • Change target framework without Navigation bar #58679
  • Exclude folder from namespace #58678
  • File-Scoped Namespace should always have a fix all option available #58673
  • Annotate IParameterSymbol.ContainingSymbol as non-null #58670
    17.1
  • NullReferenceException when calling SyntaxFactory.ParseArgumentList #58668
    Compiler.Next
  • Quick action "Move type to new file" does not fix header or remove unneeded using statements #58660
  • ClassifierHelper's AdjustSpans method occasionally generates an empty span #58658

Closed

  • Add support for a nuget package to say it does not support HotReload #56681
  • Add Option for #region to be on left or indented like labels are in options #58687
  • Hot Reload test scenario: Hot Reload notifications and reloadable types #55561
    17.0
  • Investigate purpose of Logger.LogBlock calls #55685
    17.1
  • Benchmark algorithm options for LongestCommonSubsequence #55712
    17.1
  • Null ref in CommitSolutionUpdate #56617
    17.1
  • Developers see exactly what they need to in the lightbulb menu #58275
    Backlog
  • Expose 'debug-determinism' flag (or something similar) so that tooling can determine if the compiler is confident it would return the same result. #53302
    17.1
  • VB semantic tests dumping core on Linux #29660
    Compiler.Next
  • Span<T> in async methods not supported #27147
  • Null array constant in metadata causes overflow in attribute decoding #58598
    17.1
  • Null string array passed to InterpolatedStringHandlerArgument crashes compiler and IDE analyzers #58025
    17.1
  • [SourceLink] Output window logging #57352
    17.1.P3

PullRequests

Created

  • Better parse when lambda expressions contain default parameter values. #58690
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove contract check to avoid crash #58675
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P3
  • Run debug builds for pull requests instead of full pairwise testing #58669
    Area-Infrastructure
  • SpillSequenceSpiller.Spill - ensure sequences under ref assignments are spilled. #58657
    Area-Compilers
  • Move suggestion mode configuration to state reset service #58656
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Do not synthesize a parameterless constructor for struct types; report error if struct has field initializers but no constructors #58581
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58677
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58676
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Call InitializeTelemetrySession on background thread (#58399) #58674
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • Correctly handle null array constants from source and metadata #58604
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58662
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58666
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58671
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Set the default value of Combine With Indicator Margin to false #58661
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • Reduce the number of duplicate ProjectId instances found in OOP #58667
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Upgrade Microsoft.VisualStudio.Telemetry to 16.4.22 #58621
    Area-Infrastructure, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • Remove workarounds for https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/issues/29660 #58659
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Simplify new integration tests using a source generator #58524
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58665
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58664
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58663
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58655
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • [LSP] Fix semantic tokens overlap bug #58620
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • Simplify fault reporting #58367
    Area-IDE, Approved to merge, 17.1.P3
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to main #58653
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1 to release/dev17.1-vs-deps #58654
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Don't run CI for docs-only changes #58712
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for record declarations #58482
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Null annotate ParameterSymbol and derived #58700
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement GetTypesByMetadataName #58366
    Area-Compilers
  • Update source-generators.cookbook.md #58713
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1540706 #58384
    auto-merge
  • Rename Basic to Visual Basic in Visual Studio options page #53134
    Area-IDE
  • Fix code generation to add default constraint when needed #53318
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Unskip TestSupportedDiagnosticsMessageHelpLinkUri #51882
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Rename options refactoring #58403
    Area-IDE
  • Don't crash when default namespace isn't a valid name #58704
    Area-IDE
  • Deduplicate references in CommandLineProject.CreateProjectInfo #58701
    Area-IDE
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #58703
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add GlassTestsHotReloadService external access #58456
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-IDE
  • Add a tagger that draws a line to indicate the indentation level of a raw string literal. #58518
    Area-IDE
  • IDE code generator service refactoring #58244
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Cleanup Renamer.RenameDocumentAction API #58508
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58698
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Remove a first chance exception for normal cancellation #58646
    Area-IDE
  • Add IL verification with ILVerify in addition to PEVerify #37994
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only
  • Parameter null-checking analyzer and fixer #58182
    Area-Analyzers, Feature - Param Null Checking
  • API for getting a deterministic key for a Compilation #57134
    Area-Compilers
  • Null annotate ISymbol.ContainingSymbol #58340
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix Integration test MetadataReference #58204
    Area-IDE
  • [WIP] Update incremental generator docs #58344
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, New Feature - Source Generators

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cleanup nullable annotations in razor codegeneration #39360
  • Build WASM DevServer By Default #39357
  • Blazor server application on Ubuntu 20.04 cannot find _framework/blazor.server.js #39354
  • "AspNetCore.OpenIdConnect.Nonce" and "AspNetCore.Correlation" cookies unable to set cookie as Session cookies #39351
  • Error BLAZOR102 when using CSS preprocessing #39344
    Backlog
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.21568.2] Web page shows an unhandled exception while executing the request after Blazor.Polyfill launch #39343
  • Retargeting from 6.0 to 7.0, can't run Angular/React ~ individual auth with error:Could not load type 'System.Security.Cryptography.RSA' #39342
  • Logout does not work properly after refreshing the page if Auth0 is used #39339
  • [Epic] WIP: MVC Enhancements #39338
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Requests using the absolute-form in the request line require the host to match #39335

Closed

  • Blazor wasm - ability to independently prerender only HeadOutlet component #39333
    Discussions
  • Rate Limiting for Kestrel (Connection backpressure, etc.) #39362
    .NET 7.0
  • Redesign the current aspnetcore Concurrency limiter middleware to use the new abstractions & implementations #38306
    7.0-preview1
  • DefaultHealthCheckService never logs exceptions from degraded HealtCheckResults #39271
    7.0-preview1
  • Repeatedly reloading of .NET 6 Blazor wasm page in Firefox causes out of memory #39305
    Discussions
  • [Blazor] Image element to display images that are not accessible through HTTP endpoints #25274
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [.NET 6] Publish webapi results in HTTP 404 #39359
  • ModelState errors reported by Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson #33451
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf regression: updates #39326
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #39341
  • Route Attribute not working as expected on ComponentBase / Blazor #39329

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RadioButton with content crashes app #3985

  • MAUI Blazor hybrid apps crashing on iOS / iPadOS / macOS #3980
  • AbsoluteLayout LayoutBounds with two args throws a XamlParseException #3979

  • Failed to publish maui blazor app on windows #3977
  • Hot Restart Not Working for iOS on Windows with VS 2022 17.1.0 Preview 2 #3975
  • Blazor Hot Reload is not fully working #3973
  • Parent was reset when StackLayoutManager.Measure was invoked #3970
  • Remove Behaviors when the Control is destroyed #3968
  • Adding a new class to Platforms/Android/* in a MAUI single project adds noise to .csproj #3967

Closed

  • [iOS, Android, WinUI] SwipeViewRenderer #3982
  • BlazorWebView SetLoglevel /Add Logging (WPF) #3976

PullRequests

Created

  • iOS NavigationRend-andler #3969

Updated

  • Swipe View Handler #3987

  • Add FormattedText property support to Label in Controls #3637

  • Init Essentials #3345

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test: Group By aggregate additional scenarios #27133
  • Relational: GroupBy aggregate lifting #27132
  • Simplification of Count(*) with multiple group by can generate wrong result #27130
  • Sqlite: Invalid SQL for reused alias? #27129
  • Invalid SQL generation using OwnsOne properties with .ToTable() #27126
  • Projection to SQL fails while using Math.Floor with LINQ Sum expression #27124
  • EF Core InMemory Sequential Guid generation #27123

Closed

  • When trimming, queries fail because of missing System.Math #27097
    6.0.2
  • EF Core 3.1- Parameter does not follow the model definition used for the entity property #27106
  • How to configure my Cosmos Db with Spatial IndexingPolicy #27076
  • Cosmos: Ordering twice fails #27037
  • Whether to support, object association entity table #26826

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Query: Assign proper type to CollectionResultExpression #27134
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Query: Avoid stackoverflow in lifting group by aggregate term #27131
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Bundles: Allow argument separator (--) #27128
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Add [DynamicDependency] on System.Math for trimming #27098
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Stop using GetRequired* reflection wrappers to enable trimming #27099
  • Add overload to SqlServerDbContextOptionsBuilder.EnableRetryOnFailure #27135
  • Don't issue a warning when replacing an optional dependent with non-null values #27136
  • [release/6.0] Lift GroupByAggregate when correlation predicate matches #27108
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Query: Update column expression correctly when lifting joins from group by aggregate subquery #27109
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
